text: 26.63 Ais 53.7, Mat 27.12 Agek, Jisas pen takaw olap ma yɨbɨl agak. Anɨgek, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak agak, Mɨñɨl kot mɨdobun awl, yepɨs ma agɨnɨmɨn agak. God Bɨawl pel mɨdep ak abe nɨg mɨdeb agak. Anɨb ak chɨnop yɨpɨd gɨl agɨnɨmɨn agak. Nad Bɨ God nop aglup ak, God Ñɨne yɨbɨl mɨdeban akaŋ agak?
